verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: On Wednesday] , [ARG0: House Speaker Paul Ryan] [V: sided] [ARG1: with Rep. Trey Gowdy ( R - S.C. )] [ARGM-LOC: in defending the FBI 's investigation into the Trump campaign and Russia] .
On Wednesday , [ARG0: House Speaker Paul Ryan] sided with Rep. Trey Gowdy ( R - S.C. ) in [V: defending] [ARG1: the FBI 's investigation into the Trump campaign and Russia] .
